submission:
class Solution(object):
    def largestPalindrome(self, n, k):
        """
        :type n: int
        :type k: int
        :rtype: str
        """
        if n==1:
            for v in range(9, 0, -1):
                if v%k: continue
                return str(v)
            
        dp = [[0]*(n+1) for _ in range(k)]
        dpi = [[-1]*(n+1) for _ in range(k)]
        dp[0][0]=1
        bb = [0]*(n+1)
        bb[0]=1
        for i in range(1, n+1):
            bb[i]=(bb[i-1]*10)%k
        for i in range(1, n+1):
            if (n-i)&1: continue
            for j in range(k):
                if i==1:
                    v = 9
                    while v>=0:
                        b = bb[(n-i)/2]*v
                        if (b+j)%k==0:
                            dpi[j][i]=v
                            dp[j][i]=1
                            break
                        v-=1
                    # print i, j, dp[j][i]
                    continue
                v = 9
                while v>=0:
                    b1, b2 = bb[(n-i)/2], bb[i+(n-i)/2-1]
                    if dp[(b1*v+b2*v+j)%k][i-2]:
                        dp[j][i]=1
                        dpi[j][i]=v
                        break
                    v-=1
                # print "dp", i, j, dp[j][i], dpi[j][i]
        r = [""]*n
        for v in range(9, 0, -1):
            b1, b2 = v*bb[0], bb[n-1]*v
            # print v, dp[(b1+b2)%k][n-2]
            if dp[(b1+b2)%k][n-2]:
                r[n-1], r[0]=chr(v+ord('0')), chr(v+ord('0'))
                i, j = 1, n-2
                m = n-2
                b = (b1+b2)%k
                while i<=j:
                    # print b, m, k
                    vv = dpi[b][m]
                    b1, b2 = vv*bb[n-1-i], bb[n-1-j]*vv
                    r[i], r[j]=chr(vv+ord('0')), chr(vv+ord('0'))
                    b += (b1+b2)
                    b%=k
                    i+=1
                    j-=1
                    m-=2
                break
        return "".join(r)
